subject: Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Floyd Landis of the United States is back in first place at the Tour de France after finishing fourth in a ride up one of the most challenging climbs in the Alps.
snippet: Floyd Landis of the United States is back in first place at the Tour de France after finishing fourth in a ride up one of the most challenging climbs in the Alps.
